channel.title: Resources on Infrastructure as Code Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on Infrastructure as Code Lab

item.title: Guacamole
item.description: Access to this lab environment is provided by Apache Guacamole . Guacamole makes it very easy to connect to different types of backend connections such as RDP, SSH, VNC, Telnet, etc. by wrapping them all in HTML so the only client you need is a modern web browser. There are however some caveats to using Guacamole when it comes to clipboard sharing (copying and pasting between your workstation and the guacamole RDP session).
